mapper.select: select a.id,a.longitude,a.latitude,a.qyname,a.department,a.address,a.scpermit,a.youxiaodate,a.enterpriseType,a.qydelegate,a.qyphone,a.zzcode,b.t_dictionary_name as addressName,a.create_time,a.scaddress,d1.t_dictionary_name departmentName,fazhengriqi from (select id,longitude,latitude,department,qyname,address,scpermit,youxiaodate,'enterprise_1' as enterpriseType,qydelegate,qyphone,zzcode,create_time,scaddress,fazhengriqi from agricultural union all select id,longitude,latitude,department,qyname,address,scpermit,youxiaodate,'enterprise_8' as enterpriseType,qydelegate,qyphone,zzcode,create_time,scaddress,fazhengriqi from cosmetic union all select id,longitude,latitude,department,qyname,address,scpermit,youxiaodate,'enterprise_3' as enterpriseType,qydelegate,qyphone,zzcode,create_time,scaddress,fazhengriqi from criculate union all select id,longitude,latitude,department,qyname,address,scpermit,youxiaodate,'enterprise_9' as enterpriseType,qydelegate,qyphone,zzcode,create_time,scaddress,fazhengriqi from drug union all select id,longitude,latitude,department,qyname,address,scpermit,youxiaodate,'enterprise_4' as enterpriseType,qydelegate,qyphone,zzcode,create_time,scaddress,fazhengriqi from food union all select id,longitude,latitude,department,qyname,address,scpermit,youxiaodate,'enterprise_7' as enterpriseType,qydelegate,qyphone,zzcode,create_time,scaddress,fazhengriqi from health union all select id,longitude,latitude,department,qyname,address,scpermit,youxiaodate,'enterprise_5' as enterpriseType,qydelegate,qyphone,zzcode,create_time,scaddress,fazhengriqi from industry union all select id,longitude,latitude,department,qyname,address,scpermit,youxiaodate,'enterprise_10' as enterpriseType,qydelegate,qyphone,zzcode,create_time,scaddress,fazhengriqi from medical union all select id,longitude,latitude,department,qyname,address,scpermit,youxiaodate,'enterprise_2' as enterpriseType,qydelegate,qyphone,zzcode,create_time,scaddress,fazhengriqi from production union all select id,longitude,latitude,department,qyname,address,scpermit,youxiaodate,'enterprise_11' as enterpriseType,qydelegate,qyphone,zzcode,create_time,scaddress,fazhengriqi from usemed union all select id,longitude,latitude,department,qyname,address,scpermit,youxiaodate ,'enterprise_6' as enterpriseType,qydelegate,qyphone,zzcode,create_time,scaddress,fazhengriqi from wine) a left join t_dictionary b on a.address = b.t_dictionary_code left join t_dictionary d1 on d1.t_dictionary_code=a.department where a.qyname=#{qyname}
select qyname as id,qyname as text from ${tableName}

select a.id,a.qyname,a.enterpriseType from (SELECT id,qyname,'enterprise_1' AS enterpriseType FROM agricultural UNION ALL SELECT id,qyname,'enterprise_8' AS enterpriseType FROM cosmetic UNION ALL SELECT id,qyname,'enterprise_3' AS enterpriseType FROM criculate UNION ALL SELECT id,qyname,'enterprise_9' AS enterpriseType FROM drug UNION ALL SELECT id,qyname,'enterprise_4' AS enterpriseType FROM food UNION ALL SELECT id,qyname,'enterprise_7' AS enterpriseType FROM health UNION ALL SELECT id,qyname,'enterprise_5' AS enterpriseType FROM industry UNION ALL SELECT id,qyname,'enterprise_10' AS enterpriseType FROM medical UNION ALL SELECT id,qyname,'enterprise_2' AS enterpriseType FROM production UNION ALL SELECT id,qyname,'enterprise_11' AS enterpriseType FROM usemed UNION ALL SELECT id,qyname,'enterprise_6' AS enterpriseType FROM wine) a where 1=1
and a.enterpriseType = #{enterpriseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
